headline: HOOD Q1 Earnings Call: Product Expansion Drives Outperformance and Diversification
summary: Financial services company Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) announced better-than-expected revenue in Q1 CY2025, with sales up 50% year on year to $927 million. Its non-GAAP profit of $0.45 per share was 21.8% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: How To Use Long Call Options To Limit Risk On Robinhood Stock
summary: Investors who think Robinhood stock will continue to rally and don’t want to risk significant capital can use long call options rather than buy the stock outright.

headline: Buy, Sell or Hold BGC Group Stock? Key Insights Ahead of Q1 Earnings
summary: With BGC set to announce its Q1 earnings on May 7, is the stock positioned as a worthwhile addition to your portfolio? Let's analyze the potential.

headline: 3 Large-Cap Stocks with Solid Fundamentals
summary: Large-cap stocks have the power to shape entire industries thanks to their size and widespread influence. With such vast footprints, however, finding new areas for growth is much harder than for smaller, more agile players.
